title: How to make a video loop longer for Instagram - Quora

response.answer_text: Top Answer: You may use any video editor like Adobe Premier Pro, Final Cut Pro or any FREE video editor for your phone or computer. Let’s learn how to make loop videos on Instagram with two simple methods. Method 1: Use Online Tool for Video Loop Step 1. First Visit Here to open free web tool on your browser that will help you in creating loop video for Instagram online.Step 2. Click Products option on the website’s page.Step 3. From a collection of products, you will find Loop Video option in. Click on that.Step 4. Then you will be directed to Loop Video page.Step 5. From that page either you can upload your video file or directly copy and paste the URL of the video for which you need to make a loop video.Step 6. Then the site allows you to choose the time period you need for the video clip. Select your preferred loop video length.Step 7. Now hit on the create button at the bottom.Step 8. Next, just wait for a few seconds to let your video clip to load.Step 9. You’ll see that the result you get will be longer than what you uploaded before.Step 10. Lastly, you can download the video by tapping on the Download button.That’s it;

I've actually never had this issue. Instagram takes videos up to one minute. Mine generally run thirty seconds to one minute in length after I've edited them specifically for Instagram and Twitter. Twitter's limit is thirty seconds. I would recommend going frame by frame and adding additional frames that don't detract from the continuity of your clip to the end of your video until you have the appropriate length. Afterward view it several times to be certain it flows the way you want so you achieve the impact you're looking for when you publish your video.
